citation_details.title: Neural Correlates of Hypnosis: Insights from EEG-Based Machine Learning Models
citation_details.author: Y Farahzadi, C Alldredge, Z Kekecs
citation_details.abstract: Hypnosis, a state of focused attention and heightened suggestibility, can be used as a  therapeutic tool that yields similar effects to those of medications but without known side effects.
